agent_purpose: Comprehensive Notion workspace management - creating pages, searching content, updating pages, managing databases, and organizing workspace
description: Returns structured Notion workspace operation results including a summary, detailed action data, and a list of affected or relevant Notion items (pages, databases, search results) with their titles, URLs, types, and last edited timestamps.

result.summary: Provided a sample response showing the structure and usage for a Notion workspace management action.

data.details: This is a sample response to demonstrate the required JSON structure for Notion Power Agent. Responses include a summary, detailed description, example metadata, and a sample item list for context.
